title: Minecraft 15w33a 发布
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 17:49 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。

然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。
适用于正式版的MOD不兼容预览版，而且大多数MOD都不提供对每周快照的支持。
Minecraft 1.9 仍未发布，15w33a为其第7个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

警告：15w33a有致命漏洞！请用15w33b替代！





Roar! That’s dragon for “Greetings, human. I like your face. Here’s a snapshot“.
嗷呜！末影龙说“你好，人类。我喜欢你的面容。这是给你的快照”。

This week’s snapshot brings a whole new type of potion, some smaller changes to existing potions, more changes to the Dragon fight mechanics (there’s a reason to respawn her now, and I do not apologize for making it so much harder), and a bunch of optimisations/bug fixes.
本周的快照带来了新的药水，对现有药水的改动，更多的末影龙战斗的改进（现在可以重生她（就是“她”——译注），而且我不会为做到这件事的难度道歉），还有一堆优化和BUG修复。

I would like to take this opportunity to remind people that we have not yet balanced the new (or existing) features. Things will either be completely overpowered or hilariously underpowered, so keep that in mind when playing with any new stuff!
我想借此机会提醒人们，我们还没有平衡新的（或现有的）特性。有些东西可能会破坏平衡性，所以在玩的时候要记住！

Here are some of the notable changes:
值得注意的更新:
Added new ‘lingering’ class of potions.新增“挥发（?）”药水Told the dragon that you all called her funny names, so now she’s extra angry.我们告诉了末影龙你用她的绰号叫她，所以她怒了。Optimisations! Bug fixes!优化！BUG修复！Looking into End Gateways may cause slight headaches.朝着末地Gateway里面看会头疼。Recalibrated the quantum intake regulator.调整量子摄入调节器（？）。

Searge also requested that you all know the following. I suspect he’s moonlighting as a litter pick.
Searge也要求你知道下列内容。我觉得他的兼职是捡垃圾。
It will be noticed if you throw your trash everywhere你到处乱扔垃圾会引起注意It will also be noticed if you pick it up and keep your world clean当你捡起垃圾并保持世界整洁时也会被注意

（这里指的是stat.drop和stat.pickup，见 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-484785-1-1.html 和 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-484602-1-1.html ——译注）

And these are some of the fixed bugs:
还有BUG修复：

[Bug MC-82945] – UUID error: Tried to add entity with duplicate UUID spam
[Bug MC-82945] – UUID错误：试图对实体添加重复的UUID垃圾
[Bug MC-83350] – Entities teleporting through a portal disappear instead of teleporting.
[Bug MC-83350] – 通过传送门的实体会消失而不是传送。
[Bug MC-83731] – Using /kill on the Ender Dragon doesn't end the fight
[Bug MC-83731] – 使用/kill杀死末影龙不会结束战斗
[Bug MC-85288] – "Save World" and "Cancel" Button have been switched
[Bug MC-85288] – “保存世界”和“取消”按钮被切换了
[Bug MC-85382] – Attempting to use a spawn egg on a block thats out of range throws error
[Bug MC-85382] – 再边界外的方块上使用刷怪蛋会抛出异常
[Bug MC-85397] – Adult mobs spawned with mob eggs are "invalid", they can't be selected with @e
[Bug MC-85397] – 用刷怪蛋刷出的成年生物是非法的，它们不能被@e选择
[Bug MC-85542] – Enderdragon can destroy end_portal and end_gateway blocks
[Bug MC-85542] – 末影龙能破坏end_portal和end_gateway方块

Please report any and all bugs you find in Minecraft to bugs.mojang.com. If nobody reports a bug, we can’t fix it!
在bugs.mojang.com报告Minecraft的BUG。没人汇报BUG的话，我们不会修复它！

To get snapshots, open your launcher and press the “New Profile” button. Call it “snapshots” and check the box saying “Enable experimental development snapshots” and save. To switch to the normal version, you can select it in the dropdown at the bottom left corner of the launcher. Back up your world first or run the game on in a different folder (See the “new profile” dialog).
为了获得快照，打开启动器并点击New Profile按钮，打开snapshots并选择Enable experimental development snapshots并点击保存。如果要选择普通的版本，你可以选择在下拉菜单中在启动器左下角的按钮上面。在开始快照前备份你的世界或在不同的文件夹中启动（见new profile对话框）。

Snapshots can corrupt your world, please backup and/or run them in a different folder from your main worlds.
快照可能毁坏存档，记得备份和/或在与你的存档不同文件夹里运行。

服务器jar:
http://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/15w33a/minecraft_server.15w33a.jar



正版启动器下载地址Windowshttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.exeMac/OSXhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.jar
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全PC平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。
关注最新版本资讯，请关注mcbbs新闻版 Minecraft官方版本信息索引（自正式版1.0.0至今）与版规
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft 1.9（战斗更新）特性列表 的更新。
